Articles.Content:
Here are some that i did ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

My Fat Kerbal cargo VTOL, Flys and manouvers pretty well ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

 ![9DtbL7S.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/9DtbL7S.png)

Image of Horizontal flight mode

![rsrsKqs.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/rsrsKqs.png)

Mods used were B9 For the airbrakes, Tweakscale for the large intake and rudders, and SXT for the bay doors

![GhMiMMJ.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/GhMiMMJ.png)

And my Karrier-AV6 for carrier ops

![E9gdxM0.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/E9gdxM0.png)

Sorry For Upside Down image ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Thanks for reading ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
